Timer 3 minutes Preheat pan on heat 5
Add 1 tbsp Olive Oil to pan
Cut ½ pound Flank Steak into strips
Timer 6 minutes Pan sear Flank Steak
Put beef in pyrex bowl
Put 4 Green Onions , 3 Garlic Cloves , Shallot in same pan.
Timer 1 minute Pan sear
Add Broccoli in same pan with cover.
Timer 5 minutes Pan sear
In a bowl mix 2 tbsps Arrow Root Starch , ¾ cup Water , ¼ cup Aminos Coconut , 1 tsp Ground Ginger , 1 tsp Red Pepper Flakes
Timer 4 minutes Once broccoli is done, remove cover and add sauce. Continue cooking.
Timer 2 minutes Add beef and finish cooking.
